Title: Iron Monkey
Writer: Tan Cheung, Tai-Mok Lau, Elsa Tang
Actors: Rongguang Yu, Donnie Yen, Jean Wang
Plot: A martial artist/doctor steals from the corrupt authorities as a masked thief to give to the poor while another martial artist/doctor is forced to hunt him down. But a major threat unites them as a powerful and traitorous shaolin ...
